operations.title: Get API Root Information
operations.description: Returns information contains title, description, TAXII versions and maximum size of the content body.

operations.title: Get Collections
operations.description: Returns a list of public/private/shared collection resources which users have the access.

parameters.title: collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: Returns general information about the collection, such as id, title, description, can_read, can_write and media_types.
parameters.description: Returns general information about the collection, such as id, title, description, can_read, can_write and media_types.

operations.title: Get Objects By Collection ID
operations.description: Retrieve all available objects in a Collection.

parameters.title: collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: Returns general information about the collection, such as id, title, description, can_read, can_write and media_types.
parameters.description: Returns general information about the collection, such as id, title, description, can_read, can_write and media_types.

parameters.title: Added After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.tooltip: Filter the result set to only include the items added after the specified time.
parameters.description: Filter the result set to only include the items added after the specified time.

parameters.title: Added Before
parameters.name: added_before
parameters.tooltip: Filter the result set to only include the items added before the specified time.
parameters.description: Filter the result set to only include the items added before the specified time.

parameters.title: Save Response in File
parameters.name: file_response
parameters.tooltip: If check then save the response in File else in JSON
parameters.description: Specify the response field, If check then save the response in File else in JSON
